items.simpleContent:
{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231227/2023122711435323265618.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231227/2023122711435324492925.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231227/2023122711435332585259.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"直接开始通临第二遍，逼死强迫症，有一个字没写好就想整张重写😅算了，过程中有没写好的拎出来单独再练吧。

今日练习要重练的字：“维”“在”“嗣”“威”“动”

除了要注意黑线条，更要注意“白空间”。
以及注意横平竖直，弧线向背关系，笔画间距关系。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122611495819510549.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122611501048645392.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122611495808146654.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"不要想太多，写就完了，做到心法的“静慢松”，身体慢慢会校正到最舒适自然的状态。\n\n有些字的结构真的还要多练习，没事多观察原贴。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122603481643299939.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天写了忘打卡了，每天至少一张，没有偷懒😁继续磕字体结构中。放松仍然是第一要义，继续稳住丹田发力，少用眼多用心感受。继续加强内劲，尤其是转折处，手心要攥好那一股气。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231224/2023122405320974945156.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"好像先往左边写真的更顺手一点。身体尽可能站直，感受气息在体内自如流转，然后再用意念让它汇聚到指尖，指哪打哪。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231224/2023122412062775866972.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"两个小圆圈有毒，好像之前写的挺顺的，突然就不会写了，目前是两笔，先右再左，明天换个笔顺，先左再右试试🥲","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231222/2023122212423871482694.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231222/2023122212423885782093.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这个纸适应的差不多了，疯狂画小圈圈😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231218/2023121811493066046090.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231218/2023121811493062445379.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"麻了，三天没写，写完一张胳膊肩颈酸的不行😵","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231214/2023121411454343022423.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231214/2023121411454343565126.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"鹿鸣的这个竹纸真的脆脆薄薄的，很丝滑，看着很干净清爽，说不上好坏，就是感觉摩擦力跟泾源的对比突然不一样了，我的手说：还要适应一下😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121111562720519400.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"摸鱼的一天🐟🐟🐟🐟","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2290,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121112511693557960.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121112511683451976.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121112511686851056.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"《峄山碑》第一遍通临完成✓ 2023.11.12

还有很多不足之处，字体结构要再多临摹学习！
结构写的不到位的继续精临几遍！
","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120911373232961236.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120911373236125697.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120911373238926144.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天玩了一天啦哈哈哈哈，晚上随便写一点。感觉现在写字的速度提快了不少，质量还是有保持住。应该是起笔更加熟能生巧了，不用顿好几次去蓄力，每天写一定会越写越好的！😆","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120812251821396782.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120812251822320125.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120812251824175358.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"每天写上一会字总是极好的，仿佛是生活的一把钥匙，什么难题困惑都能在写字的过程中得到答案。亦是明镜，一笔一划中，见本心，识本性。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120511311733379245.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120511311730592458.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120511311740232312.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"法形色，方寸砚台之中，自有万丈波澜，心外无字，便是千言万语。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120512383739258041.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120512383743331342.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120512383738888025.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"气定神闲，享受片刻的小欢喜~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/202312011233488707108.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120112334837922078.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"没练功直接写字感觉还是差点🥲","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231130/2023113012002973829977.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"静慢松，用心慢慢感受笔尖的力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112812170782921484.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112812180159584324.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112812170780962027.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"享受过程，让心神畅游在笔墨中~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231125/202311251046041086464.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231125/2023112510460408667982.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231125/2023112510460412459081.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":8,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天早晚加起来写了两张半，感觉现在写完一张一点都不累，仿佛可以站着写一天😂感觉全身的气通了，从脚底源源不断的上来。下笔发力更加果断。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231124/202311241154467803005.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231124/2023112411544672769373.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"中午没睡真的太困了，今天就到这了。\n尝试了一下写细一点，其实粗的写稳了，细的也很容易，起笔笔尖按压程度不一样而已。不过我觉得粗的细的都很好看，各有各的美！粗的是厚重质朴的美感，细的是圆润纤细的美感~小篆真的美到我心巴上！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112311272775443144.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112311272772989163.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112311272775349012.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"下笔前可以多酝酿酝酿，调整一下呼吸，静站一会，再写。蓄力在空中就要开始，使得笔未下气已到。然后让笔尖先行，崩住笔毫，再用周身之力使转，收笔则自然提起再往下轻顿，再顺势往下一个笔画方向开始蓄力，周而复始，如行太极之拳，气息连贯流畅。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112312043923066683.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112312044470862971.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112312043925547182.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"保持每天练功+练字！身心舒畅呐！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112110540422245900.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112110540421736406.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112110540423213415.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天的状态终于从头到尾都对味了~舒服~\n真的要每天练才能保持最佳的手感！！\n没时间的话，哪怕就写一两个字也要坚持！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231119/2023111906393029937961.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231119/2023111906393032731128.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这两个字狠狠练到了反向接笔，感觉顺畅很多了，但还不够丝滑，得继续练！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231116/2023111611595169980751.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231116/2023111611595168250639.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"两天没写了，今天一口气写了一大张，还没找回最佳的手感，写的不是特别圆润流畅（也可能是字结构的原因)，明天继续！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/2023111310563256598751.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/2023111310563257973588.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/2023111310563256427463.jpg","idx":3}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"看着一个字临的越来越像真的太治愈了~“袭”字拿下！

临新的一个字肉眼可见的飘了hhh，但放慢速度写的线质又可以了（应该可以看得出来吧哈哈哈）。

慢下来写就跟打太极一样，蓄好力顺势一发，柔中带刚，稳稳当当。
","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/2023111312381395441921.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/202311131238298998023.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这字笔画真多，总算写到一个还算满意~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231111/2023111110025781027317.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231111/2023111110025776019661.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"小tip：重心下移，更容易找到腰胯之力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231110/2023111011045540586272.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"对象在旁边开很大声音跳帕梅拉也妨碍不了我静心写字了😄\n\n不过有一说一，这个字结构有点难写，再多练练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231110/2023111012213330684773.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231110/2023111012213329216074.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"无“为”而无不“为”，放下执着，顺其自然。不刻意，不人为干扰，人体的能量会自然往好的方向去流转。御笔不是人机械地用肌肉操控笔，而是给笔注入全身的能量，让它自己随心念流转，这里的心念也就是意在笔先的“意”（又有了新的理解）。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231108/2023110811404927435694.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"晚上跟同事们打了一个小时羽毛球，晚上回家练字拿笔的时候手都是抖的😂😂换以前，今天铁定写不成了。但今天通过意念调息，写了三四个字开始稳住了！以气御笔，那自然就不受肌肉酸胀的影响了，很神奇！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231107/202311070706089141163.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231107/2023110707060902238109.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231107/2023110707060904265706.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"篆书要写的稳，真的挺不容易的，因为它是极简的，起收笔都是圆的，行笔也就是中锋，这就非常考验线条“中截”的质量。

心绪、呼吸、笔感都会直接赤裸裸地展露在线条上。只有熟练掌握心法，学会慢下来，才能做到心手合一，手笔合一，最终达到心笔合一。

所以习书法，从篆书开始，能很好地磨炼心性，锻炼内气，而气正是书法的劲道和笔势的来源，这决定了书法水平的上限。

练功也讲究一个眼到心到、心到气到，其实书法并不仅","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/202311050908447338610.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/202311050908447446548.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110509084525910848.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练了不知道多久，沉浸其中了。今天状态不是特别好，可能起太晚了😅写了好久才找到感觉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/202311050906384032327.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110509063870875461.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天写的忘记打卡了，补卡补卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110312323174118174.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"心宽福自来，心静慧自开~~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110108512744030965.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110108512750627637.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110108512782851017.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日份打卡，滴滴滴滴滴滴滴滴","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110110024907515810.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110110024935310513.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"补一下昨天的卡，不急不慢地写才舒服~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102812582544048010.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102812582545250142.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102812582532460764.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日晨练打卡，是“略略略”😜","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102812452586043212.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102812460343714757.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/202310281246034617876.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"舒畅~~写完睡觉睡觉睡觉！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231027/2023102711101512410877.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天的补卡，写的有点少，今晚回去多写写","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/2023102311541799364584.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/202310231154180185665.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/2023102311541801958172.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"抓着尾巴打卡，从心烦意乱到慢慢平静下来，书法真的是静心的良方~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102211184083299402.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102211184084419314.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102211184086236268.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"还是得早起啊...感觉不早起赖床整个人的神都是有点散的🥲被一堆破事缠绕的一个周末，无感情地练会字聚聚神","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231018/2023101809473105065057.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"时间匆匆，寥寥数笔，打个卡先","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231016/2023101610044543960107.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231016/2023101610044536078792.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231016/2023101610044547676834.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写到最后一个字气感比较强了，不是单纯肌肉发力，而是用全身之气运转笔尖，写起来也比更有节奏感——起收慢，行笔快，感觉毛笔的弹性尽在掌控之中，指哪打哪~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231015/2023101511512335385857.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231015/2023101511512510361405.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"本想随便写两个，不知不觉就快写完一大张了，明早继续~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/202310131010414815599.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/2023101310104157034517.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/2023101310104155058093.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"国庆一回来加班加麻了，开始恢复每日练字的节奏~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1282,"height":1710,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231007/2023100709183233352873.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231007/2023100709200130662076.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231007/2023100709200134478497.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"啊啊啊啊啊啊，居然有9天没练了！！🥲\n\n还好手感没有退步很多，反而写字的状态更加纯粹了，所以有时候适当停下来让自己整理消化一下学的东西也未尝不可（绝对没有在找理由找借口摆烂😅）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230927/2023092709350286358254.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230927/2023092709350282616725.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230927/2023092709350289650098.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"感觉写字的状态越来越自然了，提按也很快能找到最舒服的程度，古人诚不欺我，熟能生巧也。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230926/2023092611505762947009.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今早写了四个，划个水嘻嘻😁","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230924/2023092402522516828285.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230924/2023092402522518966773.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230924/2023092402522516162228.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"一口气写了一张多，简单的字写的快😄","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230923/2023092307562770719523.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230923/2023092307562771241818.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230923/2023092307562780210452.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这个字居然是“乃”，还以为是直呢😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230922/2023092209262741949074.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230922/2023092209262753213033.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"最近练的少，笔感有点退步。不过今天练了功，很快还是找到了腰腹和内劲的力量。仿佛用一股真气在运笔，书法就是微观的武术吧，真妙哉~\n\n笔所未到气已吞，笔已到处意未尽。这种境界需要一个字反复写，方能孰能生巧、自然而然地达到。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230922/2023092209254434018413.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天写的忘记打卡，补上补上","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230919/2023091911421013632583.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230919/2023091911421126598005.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这个“能”字挺有意思的~仔细看其实偏旁跟现代字都对得上~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1652,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230917/2023091710050903668464.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230917/2023091710050902212429.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230917/2023091710050909024464.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天手感不是很好，感觉身体软绵绵的，大臂发力不稳，看来还得先练功才行🫡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230916/2023091611252224493073.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230916/2023091611252231727051.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230916/2023091611252239175641.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写完“万”和“数”以后感觉其他的字都so easy了😏","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091510150093256641.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091510150095344968.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"连续一星期一点多睡了，今早真起不来一点儿，晚上补上😁我发现晚上的心跳好快，静不下来，努力压制了🥲","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230914/2023091409383573038548.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230914/2023091409383583560131.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"不知不觉写了好久，今天是要迟大到了😅","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230913/2023091310302335646998.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230913/202309131030368524016.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230913/2023091310303680822660.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"一口气写七个都不带喘的！浑身发热了😄","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230912/2023091211340999585876.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230912/2023091211341037885312.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"晚上静不下心写😂边看剧边写了一会","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230911/2023091109233103555492.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230911/2023091109233084246689.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这字开始写的有点感觉了，我发现把问题明确的抛出来，睡一觉就会解决很多呢。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230910/2023091011173202395922.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"数比万难多了！！！💢中间那个圆弧要不写的不对称，要不写太窄了🫠","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230908/2023090809403844058826.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230908/2023090809403859874317.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230908/2023090809403864997208.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"小篆怎么这么好看怎么这么好看😍","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230904/2023090411540185722368.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"晚上有事儿，就还是早上写的这些，打个卡吧🤯🤯","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230903/2023090312284664890760.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230903/2023090312284663531563.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230903/2023090312284669247716.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"芜湖~写到“万”字啦，是丝滑的感觉~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230902/202309020605119398618.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230902/2023090206051193811042.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230902/2023090206051201937330.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"越是保持住内劲，线条就越扎实。仿佛给笔尖注入一股“气”。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230901/202309011116502827293.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"忘打卡了，写的不多，偷偷补一个🫣","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230831/2023083109273311586280.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230831/2023083109273266815927.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230831/2023083109273321413901.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"拉线条，参加横线展。\n\n最近初学篆刻，觉得篆刻与书法的联系倒也挺有意思。使刀如使笔，使笔亦如使刀也，关键之法在于抵“尖”涩行，刀尖是笔尖，笔尖亦是刀尖，大道相通原来如此。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230830/2023083009220000036118.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230830/2023083009215991077932.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230830/2023083009215993921184.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练下线条吧今天。挺住笔，感受纸笔的摩擦，慢慢“涩行”。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230829/2023082909114158117614.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230829/2023082909114161348187.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写完上班去咯~~~~~~~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230828/2023082811381406755187.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230828/2023082811381402549510.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230828/2023082811381401687613.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"一天天的就是不务正业，今天就练了四个字，手好痛也写不了了，睡一觉明早再练吧😅\n\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230825/2023082509215668622121.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230825/202308250921567745960.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"发现现在连续写几个字脖子都不酸了，跟站姿还是有很大关系的。整个人的重心要在腰腹、丹田一块，不要探头过甚，整个身体可以微微前倾，左手扶住桌面保持平衡（但重心不可在左手臂上)。不可塌腰顶肚子，人也要有一股向上提的力，精气神也会提起来的，行笔之内力会更畅通，笔下也自然更加提的住。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230823/2023082309303094976011.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230823/2023082309303172729100.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天写上头了，一个小时写了17个字，太快了点，得刹点车😂还是要慢慢写，写快了字真的容易“飞”","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230822/202308220917544157125.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"挑战不接笔写小勾勾，可以不看着笔尖调峰啦，用心感受笔尖的力量~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230821/2023082111300243634414.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"浅浅打个卡，晚上手感好差😑","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230820/2023082010023535936627.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230820/2023082010023543196465.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"新买的那个一百多的笔到了，试了一下，感觉聚锋性更强，更好起笔一些，弹力适中，和述古差不多。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230819/202308190814239096886.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230819/2023081908153096694824.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230819/2023081908142391094373.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"心手笔感觉越来越合一了，越写越放松。\n\n有个点记录一下，身体虽然前倾但重心还是落在丹田那块，不然脖子会很酸，左手轻轻扶住桌面保持身体的平衡即可。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230818/2023081809293844751319.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230818/2023081809293844980935.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230818/202308180929384267476.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"线条要与“流”字本身的意思一样自然流畅，像是往一个方向汇聚的水流~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230817/2023081710290584687778.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230817/2023081710290585164323.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230817/2023081710290587473059.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"啊。。原来四尺半开的尺寸是这样的。。宽刚好是原来的四分之三。这批纸有点生，略微洇墨🥲不过墨沾少一点，写细就还好，诶？！我好像可以写细一点了🥹","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230816/2023081609205232990888.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230816/202308160921292108710.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230816/2023081609213567666267.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"感觉线条越写越丝滑了~这本书已经通读一遍，精读第二遍做笔记中...昨晚写到凌晨😅费脑","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230815/2023081509204106275664.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230815/2023081509204141037580.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230815/2023081509204145018938.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天终于稳稳地抓住了前两日偶尔抓住的那种感觉——蓄力、笔毫拉至最大张力的状态再用大臂带动行笔（写笔画长的线条身体也会跟着动）。\n\n这种状态有点像拉弓，弦而未发、满弓的状态。但写字的力比拉弓要小的多，可能跟弹扑克牌或翻硬皮书页差不多，用大拇指去拨一本书的书角，书角弯曲到快要弹出去的那个临界点正是书页张力最大的点。毛笔也是，笔锋先行，感觉笔尖要biu一下弹出去又还没有弹出去的那个曲度正是笔毫张力最大的","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230814/2023081410565533035088.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230814/2023081410565543562405.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230814/202308141056553461473.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这个字上面的小方块对笔尖用力的要求极高，还需要再练练。字体结构有些写的偏长了。明日复练之！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230813/2023081311340900156392.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230813/2023081311340847577704.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230813/2023081311340894883859.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"滴滴滴，打卡打卡~今天写的更顺畅一些啦~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081209531210959702.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081209531211081193.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081209531273199148.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"最近颈椎不太好，早上去医院做了推拿。在想今天要不休息一下不练了，但还是忍不住，我隐隐感觉最近到了一个突破的临界点，是练习的关键时期！万不能断！（好吧，其实经常有感觉哈哈哈哈)可能是一个字写了很多遍的缘故，仿佛领悟到了什么，又难以言明，迫不及待想要写几个字验证一下自己所悟是否正确。\n\n写完一张，意犹未尽，又拉了几根线条再多体会一下，惊奇地发现细线可以写直了诶！好像真的找到了那个神奇的发力点以及笔毫的","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081212050315679895.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"忘记打卡了，补上补上，早上写的","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081008543696070297.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081008543700859337.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081008543700719765.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"“功”写的比较顺畅了，先过了。\n\n“战”怎么这么难写啊😭救命了，7个字写了我快一个小时！“战”抖的心，“战”抖的手....","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230809/2023080909122739015.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230809/2023080909122749598176.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天没有练字，看了会书和拉线条。颇有感悟，书法博大精深，蕴含着无穷智慧。（等我看完整理分享~\n\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080811123458252204.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080811123450286357.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080811123408219626.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":7,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"发现今早打卡到昨天的去了，晚上写完了这一大张，再打个卡吧~还有些墨，拉了几根线条。

我发现有一根短横的立体感很强，用手去触摸还能摸到线条边缘明显的凹凸感！太激动了！是锥画沙、金刻石的质感！原来柔软的毛笔真的可以像锋利的刀片一样划出这样的感觉。

虽然现在手还不是十分稳，但对笔尖力量的掌控有了很大的进步！着力点非常明确了，因此也更敢于发力了，拉皮筋和行笔的迟涩感越来越明显。

还要再勤奋练习！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080810244545419696.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080810244603966036.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/202308081024455202007.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练“功”，今天写了九个字嘿;-)","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230806/2023080611511290183962.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230806/2023080611511293993421.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230806/2023080611511300911389.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天出去玩了，就练到这了~明天尽量早点爬起来练😩","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230805/2023080510245630729136.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1279,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230805/2023080510255798335451.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230805/20230805102456397109.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"1.执笔而不知笔，可谓得笔。
2.以全身之力送至笔尖，仿佛有一根皮筋在行笔方向的反向拉扯着，线条便扎实。
3.意在笔先（还需训练)，线条便流畅有“势”。
4.呼吸与提按融为一体（还需训练），行笔便自然，真正心笔一体，能表达主观的感受和意识。

给大家推荐这本书《中国书法观念十讲》，了解书法的内核精神。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230803/202308030906437624870.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230803/2023080309064366635796.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1710,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230803/2023080309064382432452.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"不弃微末，久久为功。\n为者长成，行者长至。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/202308021157471757928.jpg","idx":0},{"width":959,"height":1279,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/2023080211580577054135.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/2023080211574715533934.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写字，读书，修心，静气。\n\n书山有路勤为径，不仅需“勤练”还需“勤思”，方能行远。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230801/2023080109354763528465.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六天磕这个字了，每天练的时间少就多练几天~已经顺畅很多了，气息连贯了！\n\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230731/202307310848090471169.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230731/2023073108480903027455.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"知止而后有定，定而后能静，静而后能安，安而后能虑，虑而后能得。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230731/2023073112032396592469.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230731/202307311203239974749.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230731/2023073112032399052937.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"又是磕这个字，我觉得老师说的有道理，短横太多，缺少拉皮条的感觉，所以导致笔感不是很好。只能是多写，短横也写出那种劲道感，今天写了18个，感觉稍微好一些。真的是写了一个又想写一个😂磕上瘾了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230729/2023072909433132162970.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230729/2023072909434564313537.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230729/2023072909434561633424.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"来打卡了，又写了好多“理”字，这个字总感觉写不到位是我的错觉吗😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230727/2023072703283567252673.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"自从落枕了就起不来了😠早上都写不了几个字，重新调生物钟！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230725/2023072512073590395897.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230725/2023072512073591236424.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230725/2023072512073593338627.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"反向弯转过来了~找笔尖的力量，控制好笔尖，不要崩即可~\n\n“理”看起来横平竖直的，实际对笔画间距把握的要求很高，写完拍照才发现右半边应该要写宽一点😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/202307230522326391013.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/2023072305223264642224.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/2023072305223266372226.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日小感悟：起笔时，笔杆一定要垂直！用后端的暗劲去跪笔裹峰。这样的笔毛就会像弹簧一样，是充满弹性的，其实写出有力的字真的不需要很大的拙力，而是顺“势”而为，顺着笔毛自己的弹性去走。而越放松，对这种弹性的感知越大~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230721/2023072110293871335780.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230721/2023072110293875146433.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230721/2023072110293865737116.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"打工人们早呀，周五啦！！冲！！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070509075268875352.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070509075267819938.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"真的很神奇，练完功一口气写四个字头不晕，眼不花，腰不疼，腿不酸哈哈哈哈！\n\n一笔画要一口气写完，这里的一口气不是真的一口气，而是核心收紧，呼吸还是自然的，动作也一定要慢，缓缓感受发力。所以说站姿练字也是一种练功，觉得累说明气散了，气不顺。胡乱一些感悟哈哈😃","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/2023070409155392926380.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/202307040915540998325.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"“念”字写顺畅了呢，开始临“建”，感觉一开始临的都好丑啊🥲","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/2023070309165186316375.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"感觉这个字是真的有点难写😤写四天了，尤其是中间的横折和两个对称的弧，有时候接的好，有时候接不好🥲\n\n我在想是不是我写太快了，以前写四个字就要二十分钟，今天看了一下写这八个字半小时。。。中间没有停顿休息，一口气写的。。明天再放慢速度","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230702/2023070202322337281956.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230702/2023070202322339372024.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天又是写这个字啦，果然写多了，意自然就在笔先啦~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230630/202306300913204528604.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"临新的字了，结构应该差不多了，再练练线条的质量~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230629/2023062909220504672767.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写完最后一行，又完成一大张啦~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230627/2023062709132040862661.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天练完功（第一天八段锦)再练字，下面三个今天写的，虽然看起来好像跟昨天写的没太大区别，但感觉上比昨天写的更放松、更舒畅了！时间有限，只写了这么多，明天再早点起来练！\n\n一口气写三个都没特别累（我昨天写一个脖子就不行了🥲），所以练功+练字，法力无边哈哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230626/2023062608562306944010.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"回家断了几天打卡（不过每天有划拉两下😂），感觉精力退步了，写四个字极限了，感觉好累，胳膊肘也好累，抬不起来😭太难了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230620/202306200659414605847.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"补下昨天的卡。。。。。。。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230618/2023061811262052857715.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"桌子太矮了，写一个字脖子就巨酸。。。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230618/2023061808282237425967.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨晚写的，写完直接睡了，补上打卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230616/2023061608274336410188.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"起晚了，只练了四十分钟。拉拉线条。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230615/2023061511532335141781.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230615/2023061511533953990088.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天很sad，但还是要坚持写字，希望能让我暂时不想不开心的事，可是毛笔不听话了一样，更sad了☹️","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230614/2023061409074196432039.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"放松真的很重要，笔毫就像弹簧，你强它弱，一味加强拙力只会让它失去弹性。\n\n如何松而不懈，保持心力，做到外力和内力持续保持微妙的平衡，可能只有大量的练习，实践出真知了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230613/2023061309251919346617.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天尝试了站直，还有身体微微前倾去写，感受了一下区别。微微前倾写久了脖子不容易酸痛，而且眼睛离纸面更近一些，更好把控细节，站直写笔杆“立起来”的感觉更明显。\n\n两者前提都是手肘要打开，全身发力，感觉两种姿势都行，可交替进行缓解颈椎压力😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061208121796564886.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061208121793644474.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"做好当下，其他的交给时间~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230610/2023061009292640794743.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230610/202306100929339711010.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"其实一直都想再写写长横线，看看功力有没有进步，果然比刚练三个月的时候更有力了呢！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230609/202306090918558502386.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"“思”上面部分有点像包子，写饿了，早点吃了个大肉包😋","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230608/2023060809171534861320.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230608/2023060809171535148600.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230608/202306080917153786855.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写完拍照才发现，怎么都写的那么长，高低得再多写一个😂感觉这个外框的结构跟“威”很像，控制好它两边的弧度有点难度，“威”弧度基本对称，这个还不是对称的🥲\n\n放一只慵懒的小猫咪~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230607/2023060709072881998980.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"早起逐渐成为一种习惯啦~继续保持~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230606/2023060608340928984661.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"意在笔先的进一步感悟总结：
行笔方向若为右，那么欲右的同时还要有一股欲左的力，这种力的对抗越大，线条就会更有劲道。而这种对抗之力形成的外在表现就是对力的感知更大了。

笔杆切忌往行笔方向倒，也就我之前有说过的切忌有拖行之势。笔杆头稍微往行笔方向的反向倾斜一点，才能抵住纸张。

提按也是如此，欲按的同时也要有一股欲提的力，这样便是提中有按，按中有提。

在这样上下左右力量对抗之中的笔杆是非常稳健的，","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060411524721920864.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060411524721965809.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写字真的是个体力活！不过写完以后很舒畅~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060311124874445670.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060311124872033106.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060311124873684164.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"天气热了，越写越热🤯感觉能清晰地听到自己心脏跳动的声音😅","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230602/2023060208242075885692.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"“于”比“方”好写很多😁\n\n还是崩住劲儿，抵住纸行笔，真的一定要写慢一点！让笔墨吃透纸张，这样线条才扎实而不是浮在纸面。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230601/20230601083257869778.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230601/2023060108325786150399.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"不知道为啥，逐渐写出了气拔山兮气盖世之感😂\n是对力的感知更大了吗，感觉要用很大很大的力去行笔，但手腕手指是活的，嗯....有种拔河的感觉？","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230529/2023052908534215182317.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230529/202305290853421395656.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230529/2023052908534223997991.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天用余墨随便速写了一张小画嘻嘻😁","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230528/2023052810265575728265.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"矩形该再练练了😅反向接笔不稳定\n\n“亲”终于写到自己还比较满意了，就是里面有个短横写粗了，因为那块的毛毡被我家猫抓起来了一个鼓包🙂我才发现，抓起来打手手","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230527/202305270945418061409.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230527/2023052709454182494414.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"别说，这字有点难写😅写两个超大的！放大笔画，字越大越好控笔，就可以专注在字的结构上了，才发现这个结构是有点难把控，主要是里面的左半边，只能多写写了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230526/202305260908077375447.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"越是刻意想写好越是写不好，就像沙子越是紧握越是握不住。心顺了，线条也自然顺了。不急不慢地完成当下每一根线条，不要在意写完之后是怎样，一个字也不过是多个线条的组合。\n\n今天浅谈一下心流。对我来说心流的状态就是一种放空的状态，一种不问结果只重当下的状态，一种游离于周遭环境的抽身状态，一种失去对时间、地点、思想概念的状态。结束这种状态以后，会对刚才的状态满意，会觉得身心舒适，老师说的偶尔也会有甘甜唾液分","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230524/2023052409122237385913.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天写的状态不是特别好，慢慢来不急~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230523/2023052309183089050129.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"又是早起的一天，我行了！坚持，养成习惯！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230522/202305220819168913190.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这个字好多弧和接笔，需要耐心书写。明日再练练，上班去啦~🔆（新的公司十点上班还不打卡，真的很舒服哈哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230521/2023052109263367450842.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"又是早起的一天，写了两小时才九点多🌞美好的一天开始啦","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230520/2023052010035228571010.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230520/2023052010035218624292.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这一大张写的真很有成就感！今天6：45起来的！写了一小时去锻炼身体了，又接着写。\n\n放松是第一要义，老师的心法多看看。其次是“架势”，身体架势摆好，“笔势”自然而来。步子扎稳，肩背挺直，手肘打开，把力传导的路径先打通。再次之才是落在纸上的提按，何种力度、节奏和方向，这个就是熟能生巧，与呼吸一般自然时就上了一个新的台阶了。（偶尔还不够自然，还得每日练练练练练，一定要每日！真的非必要不要轻易断！哪怕练","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230518/2023051810522270397094.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"“既”总算写的差不多啦~“数”的笔画可真多啊\n\n一定要意在笔先，否则有时候线条就会有种没崩直的感觉。而且我发现没有意先行的话，很容易不自觉地更多用到指力，切记切记切记！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230517/2023051704334088469021.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230517/2023051704334086210150.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"绝了。。刚正式上班一天又羊了😫新的领导都说老天不让我打工hhh，今天没发烧了，居家办公写写字吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230512/20230512110754524668.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230512/2023051211075450523262.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230512/2023051211074436596284.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"我发现我现在好像进入了新的一个状态了。外面装修声的轰隆不绝于耳，阳台门也没关，竟也能静下心专注于每一笔每一画了。

以前是一定要绝对安静的环境才能写好，要“外静”才能达到“内静”。而现在，在提笔深呼吸的那一刻，就静下来了，是“内静”开始屏蔽“外躁”。

书法就是修行，人生大大小小的事情都能在书法中找到答案，一定要一直坚持写下去呀！
","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230510/2023051010594234318239.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230510/202305101059544251091.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"多观察字体结构和笔画关系，用心临一个比马虎急躁写十个更有效。\n\n看似复杂的字为什么实际要好写一些呢，因为有更多笔画可以去参照位置。写完一个一定要用红笔批改，结构慢慢地就会了然于心。我一般是对临两三个结构抓的差不多了就开始背临，这样写字的感觉会更连贯，也能把字的结构记的更牢固。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230406/2023040602240849617177.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"关于指实掌虚：
想到初学之时虽有指实掌虚之形，却未领悟到掌虽虚却需有内劲。如太极之法，看似柔弱无力，实则聚力掌心。故古人云执笔无定法，乃指“形”无定法，而其“宗”则是能聚力掌心，进而再聚力于笔尖，使力无损耗。

关于聚力笔尖：
不可有拖行之势。需始终立笔杆，起笔蓄力（藏锋以后的那个按压)，如刀尖扎入纸一般，行笔过长或力散后通过提按重新蓄力。力散的原因有很多，主要原因两点：一是因为笔画长，力的自然削","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230330/2023033007192629087876.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230330/2023033007193240540112.jpg","idx":0},{"width":404,"height":352,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230330/20230330071926170184.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"我悟了！“初”的右边起笔不能离左边宝盖头太远，纠正了一下，每次都能写出跟原贴差不多的弧度啦~

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230321/2023032102462576216089.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230321/2023032102462576068003.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日感悟：
1.写弧度像骑自行车转弯一样，稳住重心，顶住那股劲，笔杆不一定要垂直，也能行笔中锋。
2.行笔应缓缓而行，如行舟突破水面的阻力匀速向前。（这种感觉真的令人超级舒适）

第一个“立”写的最好，可惜弧度太“圆”了，然后怎么也找不到合适的圆度😂最后一排第一个的圆度差不多，但整体结构又太长了，明天继续这个字！

纸潮的不行，软软的🥲快用完了，中间的也很潮，看来得整个密封袋","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230203/2023020311532614414068.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230203/2023020311532613399851.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230203/2023020311532617140426.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"感觉线条真的产生质变了，今天写直了很多。继续巩固一两天，起笔收笔再注意一下，应该可以闯关了😆","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230201/2023020111182711441503.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230201/2023020111182712982083.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230201/2023020111182712893316.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"虽然竖线还不够直，但现在从第一笔开始就能进入状态了（以前要写半张或一张找手感），也算是进步吧~

感悟：
1.对笔尖力量的感知力进一步提升，感觉笔尖像铅笔芯一样硬了，特别是收笔的时候，以前完全感知不到笔尖的力量，现在可以了！
2.在每一次行笔过程中都能体会到笔毫的收束感，提便收束，按便铺毫，一提一按逐渐感受到书写的节奏和刀割纸的扎实感。
3.以前会不自觉的写快，现在会自动慢下来，去慢慢地把身心和手","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230120/2023012011543858292438.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230120/2023012011545782836417.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":2276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230120/2023012011545776591765.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"放了一晚上烟花，今天就浅写一下哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230118/2023011810283434341256.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230118/2023011810283435095982.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"通过先在手心起笔并放慢一倍行笔速度以后，感觉稍有进步了。\n\n今日感悟：意念控制、稳定整个手臂，用意不用力，注意力要高度集中。突然有点明白书法艺术和正常写字的区别了，在这种心、手、笔合一的状态下进行的书写是一种自我有意识的映射。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230118/2023011812263743035826.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230118/202301181226374489545.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖线也练了一段时间了，小结一下。虽然今天练的还是不太好，不过总结有利于更快速地提高。

感悟：
这段时间最主要的是执笔感受的变化。之前练横线到后面基本是三指执笔即单钩写的，因为觉得很顺手，可能是硬笔书写的习惯所致。竖线开始改成了五指执笔即双钩，因为觉得双钩有两个固定笔杆的点还是更稳定一点，单钩可以等回头写小字时切换使用。

指无定法，但有原则，那就是指实掌虚。像握个鸡蛋一样的感觉，实在不行可以真的","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221231/2022123111403703968817.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天是新年的最后一天了，新的一年希望能越写越好~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221231/2022123112084627556223.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天加班很晚，到家都快十二点了。今天下班早点，补上，练了一整张竖。我发现竖线下半段比上半段写的好，我觉得应该是视线的问题，可能我太矮了？😅😅一开始身体多前倾一点好像能解决这个问题，从倒数第六根开始，好像起笔都稳很多了呢，毛边也减少了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221228/2022122811233183976078.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"大家羊了一定要静养，晚上我就运动了十几分钟，不行了，站着写了一会字就好累喘不上气甚至有点反胃，昨天都没有这样，体力什么时候才能恢复到羊之前😵","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221227/2022122711173797446111.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"较之昨日有一点进步吧，中锋发力更到位了，发力正了手腕也就不酸了。不过大方向又偏差了😂继续练","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221226/2022122601184637154307.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221226/2022122601184636490685.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"感觉身体好多了。今天竖线大方向写的还行，比较整齐了，发力细节还不是很到位，写完这么一张手腕关节有一点点酸，说明写的还不够放松。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221225/2022122503030336336685.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"从左往右前十条是横，后面都是竖，写了两根就破功了😂毛边，方向不稳。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221224/2022122411405583847812.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221224/2022122411405585617626.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"羊的第四天，感觉快好了但身体还是很虚，写完以后头晕眼花😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221223/202212231104130236432.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221223/2022122311041301777360.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天实在没力气写，感觉手都抬不起来。\n\n最后写竖线没啥墨了，毛刺刺的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221221/202212211139325792436.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221221/2022122111393254848043.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221221/2022122111393255154370.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"退烧了，我觉得我又行了😂\n今天写竖找到了写横一样的感觉了，就还是不自觉地会写歪。。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221220/2022122011495508422690.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"头昏脑涨的，还是练几根保持下手感吧，竖线感觉按压的太重了。😵","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221219/2022121911581377925175.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"果然上班了时间就不够用🫠上面横，下面竖，晚上的手感真差","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221218/2022121811101602695711.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221218/2022121811101600623215.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖与横其实只是发力方向不一样，提按都是一样的。练就是练大臂、小臂手腕等部位向下运力的稳定性。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221217/2022121704100431768477.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221217/2022121704100453774541.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖线的方向和间距比昨天好点了，行笔不够直，起笔还不太行。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221216/2022121601335618059585.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221216/2022121601335615055412.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横线过关啦，开始竖线😂竖线好容易歪，第一笔就歪了，于是第二张我先写一个横（第三条），发现好一点哈哈哈。

还有横线容易往下歪，竖线容易往右歪😅行笔方向朝左收一点就刚好了

希望早日练直，练整齐来~

","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221215/2022121508320911316034.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221215/2022121508320915769497.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练了两张，起笔就要找到弹性很重要，总结我个人的一个快速找到弹性和放松的小诀窍：手指完全不给力，让笔自然松落，再继续行笔，手指就会自动收一个恰好的力了。写很久手都不会酸~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221214/2022121404442444287790.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写了两张，浑身发热，脚底都热乎了。\n写第一张的时候颈椎超酸，一般第二张就好很多了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221213/2022121311315776593236.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"用了老师推荐的述古毛笔，简直就是我之前两只毛笔的综合版！又柔软聚峰性又好，弹力适中🥰写到没墨了也不会拖不动，就是线条边缘会有些毛毛的，好神奇哈哈哈\n\n刚开始适应这个弹性，写的还不太稳🤨","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221212/2022121211400940095987.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"日期写错了尴尬😂今早练的一张，最后一根超细的太考验控笔了，接了两笔不太直🫣","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221211/2022121103122878837016.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"感冒了，老喷嚏🤧今天先练这么多","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221210/2022121011104178340970.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"再巩固一下下，加油加油加油","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221209/2022120906473538777728.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221209/2022120906474342453192.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221209/2022120906474339845058.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天练了两张半横线，收笔好像稳了呢！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221207/2022120703045242330990.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221207/202212070304526297312.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221207/20221207030452721642.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天换了一只弹性更好的兼毫笔写，聚锋性更强，感觉收笔好了些，两张至少有十条是自我比较满意的了😂太开心了！用余墨写了两个字😬","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221205/2022120501484898752419.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221205/2022120501484901118459.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第50天了，对毛笔弹力的感知更近一步了，每一笔在刚写下去的时候就找到了弹性，体会到了老师说的拉橡皮筋的感觉。可惜收笔还是不到位，我也不知道啥原因，咱就继续练吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221204/2022120410583281868198.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"我想我已经get到了要点，收笔也是有一个“势”的，笔尖抬起来以后，手还是在空中有个弧度，但就是咋写都写不好，笔尖就是不听话呢，今天就写这么多吧😠\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1704,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221203/2022120310565842695704.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221203/2022120310565850175196.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写了三四张，练收笔都要练哭了😭中途看了几遍老师的视频，练完最后又看了一遍，好像突然有点悟了，提起来再按下去的那个发力点好像是在线条中线偏上的位置，我一直是在正中间，或者压根就没找着这个发力点！明天再试试，估计今晚做梦都是在练收笔了😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221121/202211211150048262139.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221121/2022112111500480991776.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"找到笔尖的弹性了，慢慢感受了到比较强的抓力感，不过还不太稳。感觉像在练习骑自行车，可以上车骑行了，但还不能很直的前进。

感悟总结：
1.“聚力笔尖”即往行笔方向施加一个反方向的力，笔杆稍微往另一侧倾斜一点点，保持住笔尖的弹性，而不是用笔肚子去“拖”线条。在藏锋起笔的时候笔尖就要蓄住弹力。行笔中的提按也是为了保持这个弹性的力量。
2.“意在笔先”即提前判断手腕、手肘、大臂的发力，有时候我写线条会往","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221111/2022111110371643776212.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221111/202211111037164675978.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221111/2022111110371643868761.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨天的笔洗完后一直泡笔筒里忘记拿出来了，导致笔锋歪了，容易绞峰。于是换了新笔写，感觉新笔笔毫的弹力好大，有点不太习惯。😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221110/2022111011371903911283.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221110/2022111011375393143783.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"巩固基础，继续提高控笔能力，加强肌肉记忆。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221109/2022110901253322290904.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221109/2022110901241908342310.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221109/2022110901241915357688.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日练习三张，竖线直了好多，画矩形终于也有感觉了！一定要每天坚持练啊，一天都不能断！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221108/2022110803301638943798.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221108/2022110803302102433298.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"又是练习基本功的一天，慢慢来","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221107/2022110711342137022023.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221107/2022110711342144692458.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221107/2022110711342147728748.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横线不够完美，竖线写到最后有两根比较直了（从右往左写的)，弧线比昨天好一些，画矩形要画哭了🫠","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221106/2022110611205016599095.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221106/2022110611205012657376.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221106/202211061120501976015.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"换了新纸练习，感觉还不错。竖线的起笔收笔有进步了，不知道是不是纸的问题哈哈哈。矩形还是感觉很难，圆角不够自然😭练练练吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221105/2022110510084381438830.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1710,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221105/2022110510084383237142.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221105/2022110510084380067590.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日感悟：手突然就可以控制细微的持续的提按发力了。矩形转角处特别需要微微提起一点笔来，硬转的话笔锋有时候会调转不过来。竖线、弧线、矩形还要继续加油！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221104/2022110409544804813194.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221104/2022110409544812040128.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221104/2022110409544809620052.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今早状态比昨天好多了，往右的弧度有点感觉了，往左的弧度还不太行，矩形和葫芦有一点点进步了。拉波浪线可以体会转峰（要点和直线一样，只是加入了手腕的力量微微调峰），再去写弧线会感觉好很多。趁手感还在写几个字试试，威字好难啊😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221103/2022110309311813280155.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"心态和呼吸对线条的质量真的很重要！今天因为一些事情搞得心情很烦躁，怎么深呼吸都不能完全平静下来，一口气练了三张效果都不好，越写越烦，今天早点睡觉，明早继续吧。写字也是认识自己的过程，你的心境如何，写在纸上的线条是骗不了人的😅","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221102/2022110211520105795521.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221102/2022110211520111055088.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"写弧度一定要注重意在笔先，不然容易偏锋。线条还是有点歪，得再多练练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221101/2022110111325711953600.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221101/202211011132570787276.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天竖线感觉有点进步了，不那么歪七扭八了，但跟横线比起来还差远了。弧线、矩形还在努力地寻找毛笔的弹性和发力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221031/202210311242023198501.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221031/2022103112420236913824.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"矩形好难🥲得再领悟一下转峰","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221030/2022103011185324051870.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221030/2022103011185322295431.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天握笔非常的放松，主要依靠大臂的运动带动行笔，练了两张肩膀都不酸痛。不知道是练的多了，还是之前的发力方式不对😂明天再试试","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221029/2022102902213953825933.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221029/2022102902213918273846.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221029/2022102902213916740283.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"周末了，多练两张。第五天练竖线，抖的仍然像帕金森😂得再坚持，老师说的对，筑基非一日之功！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221028/2022102811575879683440.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221028/2022102811575877353339.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"打卡打卡打卡打卡打卡打卡打卡打卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221027/2022102711594427398558.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1276,"height":1702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221027/2022102711594264235625.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日练习横线和竖线，先打个卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221026/2022102610595538271519.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221026/202210261059054802683.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"蝉翼毛边纸还没到，还是先用之前买的加厚毛边纸。今天练习重点在笔力，写的时候不断地提醒自己：要指实掌虚，笔杆垂直，力透纸背。竖线不自觉地还是会歪😅再多练练吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1704,"height":1316,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221025/2022102510245308881874.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1712,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221025/202210251024531094758.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"用生宣纸练习了一下，感觉纸面太光滑，找不到摩擦力😂还得是毛边纸啊！今天时间有限，明天再用毛边纸继续练吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221024/2022102411400319511005.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"保持横线练习的同时加入竖线练习第二天。写竖线的手还不够稳，没有横线写的扎实，继续练练练！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221023/2022102306411659768833.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221023/2022102306411664842476.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练了一星期横线了，开始竖线和弧线，又是一个槛，还是要多练，行成肌肉记忆！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221022/2022102211154635692485.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221022/2022102211154639863198.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"来打卡了，连续站了一个多小时，感觉起笔收笔熟悉了很多，不知道横线能不能过关了，明天闯关试试~毛边纸还是好写很多，摩擦力大一点，就是我买的这个太厚了不太吸墨。（斗胆写两个字玩玩，结构把握的还不太行）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221021/2022102109491286155830.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"收笔比昨天好一点了，今天写的也更放松一些。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221020/2022102009532012420824.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"又是认真练长横的一天，继续加油","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221019/2022101909011370868038.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三天拉长线，重点练习起笔收笔。反复观看了老师起笔和收笔的视频，颇有感悟——每一笔其实都有它的节奏呀，提按正是书法的韵律。还不太熟练，要坚持练习，形成肌肉记忆💪🏻","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1056,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221018/2022101808332891387795.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日练习，感受到了笔和纸用力摩擦的感觉，起笔和收笔还是不够圆润。（纸有一点洇墨）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221017/2022101711033382733914.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221017/2022101711035082187801.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今日主要练习横线，附带练习竖线、弧线和方圆。老师说的心法真的太受益匪浅了，一定要慢下来，享受每一笔摩擦纸面的感觉！线条的质量果然有飞速提升！心平气和也是很好的一个生活心态，应当时刻保持。“意在笔先”也是今日的收获感悟，胸有成竹、意念先行，便可保持线条的中锋。起笔尚有不足，未来一周将继续着重练习线条！","hasMore":false}
